verbs.description: [ARG1: illinois middle class] [V: shrank] [ARGM-TMP: over the last 40 years] [ARGM-LOC: here] [C-ARG1: why middle - income households which in the early 1970s made up 59 percent of all households in illinois constituted just 49 percent of the state total during the past five years according to the report from the project for middle class renewal at the university of illinois at urbana - champaign university of illinois at urbana champaign urbana champaign middle class]
